pasta.service

Class AssessmentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • pasta.service.AssessmentManager

  • @Service(value="assessmentManager")
@Repository
public class AssessmentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Assessment manager.

    Manages interaction between controller and data. This class works as an abstraction layer between the controller and the underlying data models. This class contains the majority of the logic code dealing with objects and theri interactions.

    Since:
    2014-01-31
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Alex Radu

      • addAssessment

        public void addAssessment(Assessment assessmentToAdd)
        Add a new assessment

        Performs the re-linking with unit tests, secret unit tests, hand marking templates, competitions. Toggles competition to live if they did not previously have a competition connected with them. Adds the arenas to the execution queue.

        Parameters:
        assessmentToAdd - the assessment to add.

      • getLatestResultsForUser

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AssessmentResult> getLatestResultsForUser(java.lang.String username)
        Helper method
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        Returns:
        all of the cached assessment results.
        See Also:
        ResultDAO.getLatestResults(String)

      • getLatestResults

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AssessmentResult>> getLatestResults(java.util.Collection<PASTAUser> allUsers)
        Get the latest result for the collection of users.

        Gets all of the cached assessment results for every assessment on the system, for the collection of users given.

        Parameters:
        allUsers - the collection of PASTAUser that are being queried
        Returns:
        the map (String username , String assessmentName, AssessmentResult assessmentResults)

      • getAssessmentResult

        public AssessmentResult getAssessmentResult(java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String assessmentName,
                                   java.lang.String assessmentDate)
        Helper method.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the user
        assessmentName - the short name (no whitespace) of the assessment
        assessmentDate - the date (formatted "yyyy-MM-dd'T'hh-mm-ss"
        Returns:
        the queried assessment result or null if not available.
        See Also:
        ResultDAO.getAsssessmentResult(String, Assessment, String)
